Text: Do you really expect anyone to download a mystery torrent they know nothing about. How about a track listing a little info about what they're downloading?  Have you noticed that the fools who flood TPB with  abunch of crap they can not possible seed simtanelously rarely if ever have any leechers and almost never ever ever have any long term seeders.
Ok "Dawg".  If you don't like how I do it, get it somewhere else, or go die, I don't care, but don't bitch to me.
Hey moron, I haven't downloaded any of your tripe.  A 3rd grader could do a much better job of putting a torrent together. You are a F'ing idiot!

There ddawg goes again....opening his mouth to confirm the obvious.  Unbelievable.

chbrla, thanks for this.  Not my cup of tea, as I was able to unravel the huge "mystery" but keep them coming!
